P

PhysicsGroup - Class in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
The PhysicsGroup class extends the abstract Group class to provide an interface between the actual 3D scene and its interaction with the underlying physics engine.
PhysicsGroup(SceneManagerInterface, Vector2f) - Constructor for class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.PhysicsGroup
Instantiates a new physics group.
PhysicsTouchHandler - Class in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
The PhysicsTouchHandler is used to interact with application that have support for a physics engine built in.
PhysicsTouchHandler(SceneManagerInterface, RendererInterface, GLViewer, AbstractTouchHandler.CameraMode) - Constructor for class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.PhysicsTouchHandler
Instantiates a new physics touch handler.
Plane - Class in ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
The class Plane is used as a user interaction to move objects.
Plane(Camera) - Constructor for class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.Plane
Instantiates a new plane.
Plane(Camera, boolean) - Constructor for class ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.Plane
Instantiates a new plane.
